00020 //! Posses a pointer to a member of a list
00021 class XItemNodeBase : public XValueNodeBase
00022 {
00023     XNODE_OBJECT
00024 protected:
00025     explicit XItemNodeBase(const char *name, bool runtime = false, bool auto_set_any = false);
00026 public:
00027     virtual ~XItemNodeBase() {}
00028   
00029     struct Item {
00030         std::string name, label;
00031     };
00032     virtual shared_ptr<const std::deque<Item> > itemStrings() const = 0;
00033     XTalker<shared_ptr<XItemNodeBase> >  &onListChanged() {return m_tlkOnListChanged;}
00034     bool autoSetAny() const {return m_lsnTryAutoSet;}
00035 private:
00036     XTalker<shared_ptr<XItemNodeBase> > m_tlkOnListChanged;
00037     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnTryAutoSet;
00038     void onTryAutoSet(const shared_ptr<XItemNodeBase>& node);
00039 };
00040 
00041 void
00042 _xpointeritemnode_throwConversionError();
00043 
00044 template <class TL>
00045 class XPointerItemNode : public XItemNodeBase
00046 {
00047     XNODE_OBJECT
00048 protected:
00049     XPointerItemNode(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<TL> &list, bool auto_set_any = false)
00050         :  XItemNodeBase(name, runtime, auto_set_any)
00051         , m_var(new weak_ptr<XNode>()), m_list(list) {
00052         m_lsnOnItemReleased = list->onRelease().connectWeak(
00053             shared_from_this(), 
00054             &XPointerItemNode<TL>::onItemReleased);
00055         m_lsnOnListChanged = list->onListChanged().connectWeak(
00056             shared_from_this(), 
00057             &XPointerItemNode<TL>::lsnOnListChanged);
00058     }
00059 public:
00060     virtual ~XPointerItemNode() {}
00061 
00062     virtual std::string to_str() const {
00063         shared_ptr<XNode> node(*this);
00064         if(node)
00065             return node->getName();
00066         else
00067             return std::string();
00068     }
00069     operator shared_ptr<XNode>() const {return m_var->lock();}
00070     virtual void value(const shared_ptr<XNode> &t) = 0;
00071 protected:
00072     virtual void _str(const std::string &var) throw (XKameError &)
00073     {
00074         if(var.empty()) {
00075             value(shared_ptr<XNode>());
00076             return;
00077         }
00078         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> children(m_list->children());
00079         if(children) { 
00080             for(NodeList::const_iterator it = children->begin(); it != children->end(); it++) {
00081                 if((*it)->getName() == var) {
00082                     value(*it);
00083                     return;
00084                 }
00085             }
00086         }
00087         _xpointeritemnode_throwConversionError();
00088     }
00089     atomic_shared_ptr<weak_ptr<XNode> > m_var;
00090     shared_ptr<TL> m_list;
00091     XRecursiveMutex m_write_mutex;
00092 private:  
00093     void onItemReleased(const shared_ptr<XNode>& node)
00094     {
00095         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_write_mutex);
00096         if(node == m_var->lock())
00097             value(shared_ptr<XNode>());
00098     }
00099     void lsnOnListChanged(const shared_ptr<XListNodeBase>&)
00100     {
00101         onListChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XItemNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00102     }
00103     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnItemReleased, m_lsnOnListChanged;
00104 };
00105 //! A pointer to a XListNode TL, T is value type
00106 template <class TL, class T1>
00107 class _XItemNode : public XPointerItemNode<TL>
00108 {
00109     XNODE_OBJECT
00110 protected:
00111     _XItemNode(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<TL> &list, bool auto_set_any = false)
00112         :  XPointerItemNode<TL>(name, runtime, list, auto_set_any) {
00113     }
00114 public:
00115     virtual ~_XItemNode() {}
00116     operator shared_ptr<T1>() const {
00117         return dynamic_pointer_cast<T1>(this->m_var->lock());
00118     }
00119     virtual void value(const shared_ptr<XNode> &t) {
00120         shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> ptr = 
00121             dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(this->shared_from_this());
00122         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(this->m_write_mutex);
00123         this->m_tlkBeforeValueChanged.talk(ptr);
00124         this->m_var.reset(new weak_ptr<XNode>(t));
00125         this->m_tlkOnValueChanged.talk(ptr); //, 1, &statusmutex);
00126     }
00127 };
00128 //! A pointer to a XListNode TL, T is value type
00129 template <class TL, class T1, class T2 = T1>
00130 class XItemNode : public _XItemNode<TL, T1>
00131 {
00132     XNODE_OBJECT
00133 protected:
00134     XItemNode(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<TL> &list, bool auto_set_any = false)
00135         :  _XItemNode<TL, T1>(name, runtime, list, auto_set_any) {
00136     }
00137 public:
00138     virtual ~XItemNode() {}
00139     operator shared_ptr<T2>() const {
00140         return dynamic_pointer_cast<T2>(this->m_var->lock());
00141     }
00142     virtual shared_ptr<const std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item> > itemStrings() const
00143     {
00144         shared_ptr<std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item> > items(new std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item>());
00145         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> children(this->m_list->children());
00146         if(children) {
00147             for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = children->begin(); it != children->end(); it++) {
00148                 if(dynamic_pointer_cast<T1>(*it) || dynamic_pointer_cast<T2>(*it)) {
00149                     XItemNodeBase::Item item;
00150                     item.name = (*it)->getName();
00151                     item.label = (*it)->getLabel();
00152                     items->push_back(item);
00153                 }
00154             }
00155         }
00156         return items;
00157     }
00158 };

00160 //! Contain strings, value is one of strings
00161 class XComboNode : public XItemNodeBase
00162 {
00163     XNODE_OBJECT
00164 protected:
00165     explicit XComboNode(const char *name, bool runtime = false, bool auto_set_any = false);
00166 public:
00167     virtual ~XComboNode() {}
00168   
00169     virtual std::string to_str() const;
00170     virtual void add(const std::string &str);
00171     virtual void clear();
00172     virtual operator int() const;
00173     virtual void value(int t);
00174     virtual void value(const std::string &);
00175     virtual shared_ptr<const std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item> > itemStrings() const;
00176 protected:
00177     virtual void _str(const std::string &value) throw (XKameError &);
00178 private:
00179     atomic_shared_ptr<std::deque<std::string> > m_strings;
00180     atomic_shared_ptr<std::pair<std::string, int> > m_var;
00181     XRecursiveMutex m_write_mutex;
00182 };
